targets.rawSql: SELECT node_id AS value FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}' LIMIT 1;
SELECT short_name AS value FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}' LIMIT 1;
SELECT long_name AS value FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}' LIMIT 1;
SELECT hw_model AS value FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}' LIMIT 1;
SELECT role AS value FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}' LIMIT 1;

SELECT CASE WHEN last_seen >= now() - interval '5 minutes' THEN 'Online' WHEN last_seen >= now() - interval '1 hour' THEN 'Idle' ELSE 'Offline' END AS value FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}' LIMIT 1;

SELECT round(pp.latitude::numeric, 5) as latitude, round(pp.longitude::numeric, 5) as longitude, n.short_name, pd.time, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY pd.time ASC) as point_order FROM stridetastic_api_positionpayload pp JOIN stridetastic_api_packetdata pd ON pd.id = pp.packet_data_id JOIN stridetastic_api_packet p ON p.id = pd.packet_id JOIN stridetastic_api_node n ON n.id = p.from_node_id WHERE p.from_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}') AND pp.latitude IS NOT NULL AND pp.longitude IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter(pd.time) ORDER BY pd.time ASC;

SELECT COALESCE(round(pp.latitude::numeric, 5), 0) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_positionpayload pp JOIN stridetastic_api_packetdata pd ON pd.id = pp.packet_data_id JOIN stridetastic_api_packet p ON p.id = pd.packet_id WHERE p.from_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}') ORDER BY pd.time DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT COALESCE(round(pp.longitude::numeric, 5), 0) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_positionpayload pp JOIN stridetastic_api_packetdata pd ON pd.id = pp.packet_data_id JOIN stridetastic_api_packet p ON p.id = pd.packet_id WHERE p.from_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}') ORDER BY pd.time DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT COALESCE(round(altitude::numeric, 2), 0) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}' LIMIT 1;

SELECT $__timeGroup(tp.time, '5m') AS "time", avg(tp.battery_level) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_telemetrypayload tp WHERE tp.packet_data_id IN (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_packetdata WHERE packet_id IN (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_packet WHERE from_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}'))) AND $__timeFilter(tp.time) GROUP BY $__timeGroup(tp.time, '5m') HAVING avg(tp.battery_level) IS NOT NULL ORDER BY "time";

SELECT $__timeGroup(tp.time, '5m') AS "time", avg(tp.uptime_seconds) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_telemetrypayload tp WHERE tp.packet_data_id IN (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_packetdata WHERE packet_id IN (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_packet WHERE from_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}'))) AND $__timeFilter(tp.time) AND tp.uptime_seconds IS NOT NULL GROUP BY $__timeGroup(tp.time, '5m') ORDER BY "time";
SELECT COALESCE(battery_level, 0) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}' LIMIT 1;
SELECT COALESCE(round(voltage::numeric, 2), 0) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}' LIMIT 1;

SELECT COALESCE(round((tp.uptime_seconds / 86400.0)::numeric, 2), 0) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_telemetrypayload tp WHERE tp.packet_data_id IN (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_packetdata WHERE packet_id IN (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_packet WHERE from_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}'))) ORDER BY tp.time DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT COALESCE(round(temperature::numeric, 2), 0) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_telemetrypayload WHERE packet_data_id IN (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_packetdata WHERE packet_id IN (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_packet WHERE from_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}'))) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT COALESCE(round(relative_humidity::numeric, 2), 0) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_telemetrypayload WHERE packet_data_id IN (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_packetdata WHERE packet_id IN (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_packet WHERE from_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}'))) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT COALESCE(round(barometric_pressure::numeric, 2), 0) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_telemetrypayload WHERE packet_data_id IN (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_packetdata WHERE packet_id IN (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_packet WHERE from_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}'))) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT COALESCE(round(iaq::numeric, 2), 0) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_telemetrypayload WHERE packet_data_id IN (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_packetdata WHERE packet_id IN (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_packet WHERE from_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}'))) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT $__timeGroup(tp.time, '1m') AS "time", avg(tp.temperature) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_telemetrypayload tp WHERE tp.packet_data_id IN (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_packetdata WHERE packet_id IN (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_packet WHERE from_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}'))) AND $__timeFilter(tp.time) AND tp.temperature IS NOT NULL GROUP BY $__timeGroup(tp.time, '1m') ORDER BY "time";

SELECT $__timeGroup(tp.time, '1m') AS "time", avg(tp.relative_humidity) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_telemetrypayload tp WHERE tp.packet_data_id IN (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_packetdata WHERE packet_id IN (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_packet WHERE from_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}'))) AND $__timeFilter(tp.time) AND tp.relative_humidity IS NOT NULL GROUP BY $__timeGroup(tp.time, '1m') ORDER BY "time";

SELECT COALESCE(round(avg(latency_ms)::numeric, 2), 0) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_nodelatencyhistory WHERE node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}') AND time >= now() - interval '24 hours';

SELECT COALESCE(round(100.0 * count(CASE WHEN reachable THEN 1 END) / NULLIF(count(*), 0), 2), 0) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_nodelatencyhistory WHERE node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}') AND time >= now() - interval '24 hours';

SELECT COALESCE(round(avg(rx_rssi)::numeric, 2), 0) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_packet WHERE from_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}') AND time >= now() - interval '24 hours';

SELECT COALESCE(round(avg(rx_snr)::numeric, 2), 0) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_packet WHERE from_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}') AND time >= now() - interval '24 hours';
SELECT COALESCE(channel_utilization, 0) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}' LIMIT 1;
SELECT COALESCE(air_util_tx, 0) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}' LIMIT 1;

WITH minute_buckets AS (SELECT date_trunc('minute', ts)::timestamp AS bucket FROM generate_series($__timeFrom()::timestamp, $__timeTo()::timestamp, '1 minute'::interval) ts UNION ALL SELECT date_trunc('minute', now())::timestamp) SELECT DISTINCT mb.bucket::timestamp AS "time", avg(l.latency_ms)::numeric(8,2) AS value FROM minute_buckets mb LEFT JOIN stridetastic_api_nodelatencyhistory l ON l.node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}') AND l.time >= mb.bucket AND l.time < mb.bucket + interval '1 minute' AND l.latency_ms IS NOT NULL GROUP BY mb.bucket ORDER BY mb.bucket;

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(tp.time, '1m') AS "time",
  avg(tp.air_util_tx) AS "Airtime (Duty Cycle)"
FROM stridetastic_api_telemetrypayload tp
WHERE tp.air_util_tx <> 0
  AND tp.packet_data_id IN (
    SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_packetdata
    WHERE packet_id IN (
      SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_packet
      WHERE from_node_id = (
        SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node
        WHERE node_id = '${node}'
      )
    )
  )
  AND $__timeFilter(tp.time)
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(tp.time, '1m')
ORDER BY "time";

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(tp.time, '1m') AS "time",
  avg(tp.channel_utilization) AS "Channel Utilization"
FROM stridetastic_api_telemetrypayload tp
WHERE tp.channel_utilization <> 0
  AND tp.packet_data_id IN (
    SELECT id
    FROM stridetastic_api_packetdata
    WHERE packet_id IN (
      SELECT id
      FROM stridetastic_api_packet
      WHERE from_node_id = (
        SELECT id
        FROM stridetastic_api_node
        WHERE node_id = '${node}'
      )
    )
  )
  AND $__timeFilter(tp.time)
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(tp.time, '1m')
ORDER BY "time";
SELECT count(*) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_packet WHERE to_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}') AND time >= now() - interval '24 hours';
SELECT count(*) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_packet WHERE from_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}') AND time >= now() - interval '24 hours';

SELECT COALESCE(round(count(*) / NULLIF(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (max(time) - min(time))) / 60.0, 0), 2), 0) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_packet WHERE from_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}') AND time >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp AND time < $__timeTo()::timestamp;

SELECT COALESCE(round(count(*) / NULLIF(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (max(time) - min(time))) / 3600.0, 0), 2), 0) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_packet WHERE from_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}') AND time >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp AND time < $__timeTo()::timestamp;

SELECT COALESCE(round(100.0 * count(CASE WHEN ackd THEN 1 END) / NULLIF(count(CASE WHEN want_ack THEN 1 END), 0), 2), 0) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_packet WHERE from_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}') AND time >= now() - interval '24 hours' AND want_ack = true;

SELECT $__timeGroup(p.time, '1m') AS "time", count(*) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_packet p WHERE p.from_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}') AND $__timeFilter(p.time) GROUP BY $__timeGroup(p.time, '1m') ORDER BY "time";

SELECT COALESCE(pd.port, 'UNKNOWN') AS port, count(*) AS value FROM stridetastic_api_packet p LEFT JOIN stridetastic_api_packetdata pd ON p.id = pd.packet_id WHERE p.from_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}') AND $__timeFilter(p.time) GROUP BY pd.port ORDER BY value DESC;

WITH all_neighbors AS (
    -- Get neighbors from both directions
    SELECT DISTINCT
        COALESCE(out_edge.target_node_id, in_edge.source_node_id) as neighbor_id,
        COALESCE(out_node.node_id, in_node.node_id) as neighbor_node_id,
        COALESCE(out_node.short_name, in_node.short_name) as short_name,
        COALESCE(out_node.long_name, in_node.long_name) as long_name,
        CASE 
            WHEN out_edge.id IS NOT NULL AND in_edge.id IS NOT NULL THEN 'Bidirectional'
            WHEN out_edge.id IS NOT NULL THEN 'Towards'
            WHEN in_edge.id IS NOT NULL THEN 'Backwards'
        END as directionality,
        out_edge.last_rx_rssi as sent_rssi,
        ROUND(out_edge.last_rx_snr::numeric, 2) as sent_snr,
        out_edge.last_seen as sent_last_seen,
        in_edge.last_rx_rssi as received_rssi,
        ROUND(in_edge.last_rx_snr::numeric, 2) as received_snr,
        in_edge.last_seen as received_last_seen
    FROM (
        SELECT * FROM stridetastic_api_edge 
        WHERE source_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}')
        AND last_hops = 0
    ) out_edge
    FULL OUTER JOIN (
        SELECT * FROM stridetastic_api_edge
        WHERE target_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}')
        AND last_hops = 0
    ) in_edge ON out_edge.target_node_id = in_edge.source_node_id
    LEFT JOIN stridetastic_api_node out_node ON out_edge.target_node_id = out_node.id
    LEFT JOIN stridetastic_api_node in_node ON in_edge.source_node_id = in_node.id
)
SELECT 
    an.neighbor_node_id as "Node ID",
    an.short_name as "Short Name",
    an.long_name as "Long Name",
    an.directionality as "Directionality",
    an.sent_rssi as "Sent RSSI",
    an.sent_snr as "Sent SNR",
    nl_out.node_a_to_node_b_packets as "Sent Packets",
    an.sent_last_seen as "Sent Last Seen",
    an.received_rssi as "Received RSSI",
    an.received_snr as "Received SNR",
    nl_in.node_b_to_node_a_packets as "Received Packets",
    an.received_last_seen as "Received Last Seen"
FROM all_neighbors an
LEFT JOIN stridetastic_api_nodelink nl_out ON 
    nl_out.node_a_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}')
    AND nl_out.node_b_id = an.neighbor_id
LEFT JOIN stridetastic_api_nodelink nl_in ON
    nl_in.node_a_id = an.neighbor_id
    AND nl_in.node_b_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}')
ORDER BY an.neighbor_node_id;

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN nl.node_a_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}')
        THEN node_b.node_id
        ELSE node_a.node_id
    END::text as "Remote Node",
    CASE 
        WHEN nl.node_a_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}')
        THEN node_b.short_name
        ELSE node_a.short_name
    END as "Name",
    CASE 
        WHEN nl.node_a_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}')
        THEN nl.node_a_to_node_b_packets
        ELSE nl.node_b_to_node_a_packets
    END::int as "Sent to",
    CASE 
        WHEN nl.node_a_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}')
        THEN nl.node_b_to_node_a_packets
        ELSE nl.node_a_to_node_b_packets
    END::int as "Received from",
    CASE WHEN nl.is_bidirectional THEN '' ELSE '' END as "Bidirectional",
    nl.last_activity as "Last Activity"
FROM stridetastic_api_nodelink nl
JOIN stridetastic_api_node node_a ON nl.node_a_id = node_a.id
JOIN stridetastic_api_node node_b ON nl.node_b_id = node_b.id
WHERE nl.node_a_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}')
    OR nl.node_b_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}')
ORDER BY nl.last_activity DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT
    id,
    title,
    subtitle
FROM (
    SELECT 
        (SELECT node_id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}') as id,
        (SELECT node_id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}') as title,
        (SELECT COALESCE(short_name, 'N/A') || ' / ' || COALESCE(long_name, 'N/A') FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}') as subtitle
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 
        target_node.node_id::text as id,
        target_node.node_id::text as title,
        COALESCE(target_node.short_name, 'N/A') || ' / ' || COALESCE(target_node.long_name, 'N/A') as subtitle
    FROM stridetastic_api_edge e
    JOIN stridetastic_api_node target_node ON e.target_node_id = target_node.id
    WHERE e.source_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}')
    AND e.last_hops = 0
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT 
        source_node.node_id::text as id,
        source_node.node_id::text as title,
        COALESCE(source_node.short_name, 'N/A') || ' / ' || COALESCE(source_node.long_name, 'N/A') as subtitle
    FROM stridetastic_api_edge e
    JOIN stridetastic_api_node source_node ON e.source_node_id = source_node.id
    WHERE e.target_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}')
    AND e.last_hops = 0
) all_nodes
ORDER BY id;

SELECT 
    id,
    source,
    target,
    mainstat,
    secondarystat
FROM (
    -- Outgoing: We hear neighbor
    SELECT 
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY target_node.node_id) || '_out' as id,
        (SELECT node_id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}') as source,
        target_node.node_id::text as target,
        'SNR: ' || ROUND(e.last_rx_snr::numeric, 2)::text as mainstat,
        'RSSI: ' || COALESCE(e.last_rx_rssi, 0)::text as secondarystat
    FROM stridetastic_api_edge e
    JOIN stridetastic_api_node target_node ON e.target_node_id = target_node.id
    WHERE e.source_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}')
    AND e.last_hops = 0
    
    UNION ALL
    
    -- Incoming: They hear us
    SELECT 
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY source_node.node_id) || '_in' as id,
        source_node.node_id::text as source,
        (SELECT node_id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}') as target,
        'SNR: ' || ROUND(e.last_rx_snr::numeric, 2)::text as mainstat,
        'RSSI: ' || COALESCE(e.last_rx_rssi, 0)::text as secondarystat
    FROM stridetastic_api_edge e
    JOIN stridetastic_api_node source_node ON e.source_node_id = source_node.id
    WHERE e.target_node_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}')
    AND e.last_hops = 0
) all_edges;

SELECT 
    DATE_TRUNC('hour', nl.last_activity) as "time",
    CASE 
        WHEN nl.node_a_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}')
        THEN 'Sent'
        ELSE 'Received'
    END as "Direction",
    SUM(CASE 
        WHEN nl.node_a_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}')
        THEN nl.node_a_to_node_b_packets
        ELSE nl.node_b_to_node_a_packets
    END)::int as "Packets"
FROM stridetastic_api_nodelink nl
WHERE (nl.node_a_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}')
    OR nl.node_b_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}'))
GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('hour', nl.last_activity), 
         CASE 
            WHEN nl.node_a_id = (SELECT id FROM stridetastic_api_node WHERE node_id = '${node}')
            THEN 'Sent'
            ELSE 'Received'
         END
ORDER BY DATE_TRUNC('hour', nl.last_activity) ASC;

list.label: Node
list.name: node
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(node_id, ' - ', COALESCE(short_name, 'N/A'), ' / ', COALESCE(long_name, 'N/A')) AS __text, node_id AS __value FROM stridetastic_api_node ORDER BY node_id;
